fields.headline: Quick getaways
fields.bodyText: Under £400 Laze on the island of Fuerteventura from £329pp for seven nights' selfcatering at the three-star Broncemar Beach Aparthotel in Caleta de Fuste. Departing Birmingham on 19 March with Thomas Cook (0870 111 1111; thomascook.com). Stay in the lap of luxury at the Hotel Sonneschein in the Austrian resort of Niederau with Skideals (0800 027 8764; skideals.com) for £379pp. Flights are included and the hotel boasts an indoor pool, solarium and whirlpool. Based near the nursery slopes, the hotel is good for beginners. Under £500 Love Las Vegas? Why not jet off next weekend for a gambling holiday with a stay at the Hampton Inn Tropicana, just off the strip? This three-night break costs from £418pp and includes flights, transfers and accommodation with onlinetravel.com. Departs 25 February from London Gatwick. Under £600 Discover Qatar on a four-night break for £565 between 4 and 20 March, inclusive of flights from Heathrow or Manchester, at the five-star Ritz Carlton Doha with Voyana (020 8515 4601; voyana.com/abudhabi). Under £1,000 Chill out in Cuba at the four-star Superclubs Breezes, Jibacoa. Ideal for couples who want to have a quiet break. A nine-night stay costs from £965pp. Price includes flights, transfers and accommodation with Captivating Cuba (0870 043 5310; captivatingcuba.com). Under £2,300 Holiday like a star at Sandy Lane, Barbados. Travel Counsellors (0800 195 8852) is offering a five-night break there from £2,209pp. This includes a spa treatment and golf. Perfect for families who are looking for a choice of leisure options.
